Adam Smith.description: writing and researching for his book on creativity (reviewing his notes on creativity theories) @ the Ville:Adam Smith's house:main room:desk

Arthur Burton.description: conversing about Arthur Burton and Carlos Gomez discussing Carlos's sunrise poetry and Arthur's new seasonal cocktail recipe, with plans for Carlos to try the drink at The Rose and Crown and potentially inspire a new menu section. @ <persona> Carlos Gomez
chat: Arthur Burton
Hey Carlos! Fancy seeing you here. I see you're deep in thought—working on some poetry? Nature always has a way of inspiring the best ideas, doesn't it?
Carlos Gomez
Hey Arthur! Yeah, nature's my muse today. Just trying to capture the essence of a sunrise in words. What about you? Stocking up for a big night at the bar?
Arthur Burton

You know it! Always prepping for a lively evening at The Rose and Crown. I’m experimenting with a new cocktail recipe today—something fresh and seasonal. Maybe I’ll even name it after your sunrise poem if it turns out well!
Carlos Gomez
That sounds like a great idea, Arthur! A cocktail inspired by a sunrise—now that’s poetic. Let me know how it turns out. I might even swing by The Rose and Crown tonight to try it!
Arthur Burton
That would be fantastic, Carlos! I’d love to have you stop by and be the first to try it. I’ll make sure to save a seat for you at the bar. Maybe your poem will inspire a whole new menu section!
Carlos Gomez
That sounds like a plan, Arthur! I’ll bring my notebook too—who knows, maybe the atmosphere at The Rose and Crown will spark some new ideas. See you tonight!
